description: The one who is the light of the heavens and the earth. He guides with His light whom He wills.
benefit: Recitation fills the heart with inner light (Nur) and bestows spiritual insight.
dua: Yā Nūr, illuminate my heart, my grave, and my path with Your light.

quran_reference.text_en: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.

recitation_count.reward: The reciter will receive inner light and their face will be radiant.

daily_tip: Seek light through the Quran today, which is a light from An-Nūr.
reflections: Physical light is only a creation of His. He is the true, absolute Light.
Without His light of guidance, we would all be lost in darkness.
dhikr_time: After morning prayer or when feeling lost and confused.

description: The one who provides guidance and leads His servants to the path of righteousness.
benefit: Recitation grants spiritual knowledge and divine guidance.
dua: Yā Hādī, guide me to the straight path and make me a means of guidance for others.

quran_reference.text_ar: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
quran_reference.text_en: And indeed, Allah is the Guide of those who have believed to a straight path.

recitation_count.reward: The reciter will be blessed with spiritual guidance and knowledge.

daily_tip: When making a decision today, pray two rak'ah (Istikhara) and ask Al-Hādī for guidance.
reflections: I can't find the right way by my own intellect alone; I am in constant need of Al-Hādī.
He guides not only through scripture, but through signs, people, and events.
dhikr_time: When seeking direction in life or making a choice.

description: The one who originates all of creation in a unique and incomparable way, without any preceding example.
benefit: Recitation for a specific purpose or in times of distress can bring relief. It enhances creativity.
dua: Yā Badī', Originator of the heavens and the earth, relieve my grief and grant me success in my creative endeavors.

quran_reference.text_en: Originator of the heavens and the earth.

recitation_count.reward: Reciting 'Yā Badī' al-samāwāti wal-'arḍ' helps in accomplishing difficult tasks.

daily_tip: Appreciate the unique beauty of creation today, from a snowflake to a fingerprint, and remember the Originator.
reflections: Every single thing in existence is a masterpiece of His unique creation.
This name inspires me to think outside the box and pursue innovation in a good way.
dhikr_time: When in grief or when starting a creative project.

description: The one whose existence is eternal and will never end. He is everlasting.
benefit: Recitation ensures that one's good deeds are accepted and preserved, and provides protection.
dua: Yā Bāqī, make me firm upon deeds that are everlasting and grant me a place in the everlasting abode.

quran_reference.text_ar: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
quran_reference.text_en: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

recitation_count.reward: The reciter will be saved from all dangers and their work will be preserved.

daily_tip: Focus on deeds that have an everlasting reward (Sadaqah Jariyah), as they will remain, unlike worldly things.
reflections: Everything I love and own will perish, but Allah will remain. This puts life into perspective.
Connecting with the Everlasting gives a sense of stability in a transient world.
dhikr_time: Before sunrise, for protection and perseverance of deeds.

description: The one to whom all possessions return after their temporary owners are gone. He is the sole inheritor of the universe.
benefit: Recitation leads to long life and success in one's endeavors.
dua: Yā Wārith, make me among the righteous inheritors of Paradise.

quran_reference.text_ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحْنُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
quran_reference.text_en: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.

recitation_count.reward: Helps in getting guidance on difficult problems and grants a pious child.

daily_tip: Use the resources Allah has given you wisely, as they will all return to Him, the True Inheritor.
reflections: Nothing is truly mine; I am just a temporary trustee.
This name frees me from the pain of loss, as everything belongs to Allah in the first place.
dhikr_time: Between Maghrib and Isha, for guidance and success.

translation_en: The Guide to the Right Path
description: The one who is the ultimate guide to righteousness and who directs all things to their correct course with perfect wisdom.
benefit: Recitation helps in planning and managing tasks successfully and provides protection from mishaps.
dua: Yā Rashīd, guide my plans and decisions, and keep me on the path of righteousness.

quran_reference.text_ar: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
quran_reference.text_en: And we do not know whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.

recitation_count.reward: Helps in the execution of plans and protects from financial problems.

daily_tip: Before starting a project, seek guidance from Ar-Rashīd to ensure it follows a righteous and wise path.
reflections: While Al-Hādī shows the path, Ar-Rashīd ensures the journey on the path is wise and rightly-guided.
His guidance is not just about belief, but also about practical wisdom in worldly affairs.
dhikr_time: Between Maghrib and Isha for help in decision making.

description: The one who is most patient and forbearing. He does not hasten to punish the disobedient, giving them time to repent.
benefit: Recitation provides patience and perseverance in times of difficulty, anxiety, and grief.
dua: Yā Ṣabūr, grant me beautiful patience (ṣabran jamīlā) to endure my trials and remain steadfast.

quran_reference.text_en: Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

recitation_count.reward: The reciter will be saved from difficulties and will be given patience.

daily_tip: When faced with a delay or frustration today, practice patience and remember the patience of Aṣ-Ṣabūr with His creation.
reflections: If Allah can be so patient with all the disobedience He witnesses, surely I can be more patient with my small troubles.
This name is a source of immense strength, reminding me that Allah is with those who are patient.
dhikr_time: Before sunrise or anytime one is afflicted with calamity or sorrow.
